packsmith.TEXT:
All sigils are kind of like...
permissions of sorts.

All this one does is let you
talk to me.

...Stop looking disappointed
it's a high honor!

candle.TEXT:
It's sufficient to light any
space.

You'll likely be able to see
things back home you 
couldn't before

ascension.TEXT:
Looks like a portal or
something.

Not sure exactly what it does
but.

It's attached itself to your
wheel

Clicking on the wheel should
tell you more.

emptiness.TEXT: A vague memory of a face.

It's honestly kind of creepy
that you have this.

Wearing this will amplify an
emotion of your choice
to a considerable degree.

To the point where it persists
after death.

...You'd have to wear it
though.
Ew.

ritual.TEXT:
A relic from hell, the
ritual.

It represents a deal with
the devil, though the
devil happens to be dead.

So it's peculiar that this
is working at all.
Maybe a new one spawned in.

hell.TEXT:
Oh hey, it's the sigil of a
blue baby.

Those things are the
servants of Divine.

You could probably use this
to get into heaven!

...actually there's no perm
for that in here.
Guess it's useless then.

packsmith.TEXT:
You should get more rust
from that wheel now.

candle.TEXT:
I've increased the strength
 of the light.

The warm glow should make
shrooms grow twice as
fast.

Which makes no sense since
they like dim lighting.

ascension.TEXT:
I don't think I know enough
to touch this.

It seems to be sucking in
momentum at an increased
rate.
I barely touched it I swear.

emptiness.TEXT:
I'm not entirely sure what
you want me to do with this.

You're going to wear that?
Really?.

It uh, looks good on you
I think?

ritual.TEXT:
This one's easy, I can just
replace one of these
candles with one of mine.

Now the first candle you
Light is free.
I'm not giving you any more.

hell.TEXT:
There's a powerful contract
etched into this sigil.

I can start this contract
for you, but be warned.

This thing is tough, even
starting it requires
everything you've gotten
up till now.

It will invert the effect
of your current emotion
turning it into a debuff.

What exactly that is...
Eh, you'll find out.

This will persist until
you regain this sigil
and augment it again.

If you don't want to
do this yet, it's ok
to just leave.

hell challenge beaten?.TEXT:
There's a powerful contract
etched into this sigil.

I can start this contract
for you, but...

You've already finished it
somehow. Huh.

Well good for you, you've
been updated.

Go ahead and try entering
hell now.

second.TEXT:
I can draw out the power
of the blue babies and
make you immortal!!

It's not implemented yet so
I don't have to explain
shit.
